page.title: 02Clubs-Herdings & Frechville
page.content: Herdings and Frechville Youth Clubs offer numerous activities for children aged 7-16 e.g. snooker,space invaders,tennis,discos,video and television.You can buy refreshments like tea,coffee,coke,crisps...Around Christmas,Easter and Valentine's day they have fancy dress parties.They have regular trips e.g.camping and zoo visits.There are more boys than girls at Herdings club. At Frechville there is a community association which plays host to various voluntary groups.These include a drama group,pantomine society,Frechville childrens show group,an unemployed club and a mother and toddler group.At Frechville library on Smalldale Rd. There are 2 clubs to encourage young readers.These are the under 5's story hour and the Friday 8-13 library club.
